question: What is it that made that particular culture positive in terms of human well-being and human flourishing?
Just to throw in a question on Jefferson and Paine, do you think America would exist without those two figures?
Do these terms mean anything other than the good of all of the individuals in the country?
Is it the standard of well-being some algorithm that maximizes the well-being of a group, some utilitarian function?
First I want to know factually, is it true that all societies work like this?
So the real issue is, you know, you asked before, what is the value of relationship?
How can you not care whether that society is capable of passing it on to the next generation or not?
